system.note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Two-Handed and Harness Mounted and consisting of two adamantine blades powered by hydraulics. Useful for cutting through objects and people.

description.value:

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Two-Handed and Harness Mounted and consisting of two adamantine blades powered by hydraulics. Useful for cutting through objects and people.
